contents.author: － Napoleon Bonaparte
contents.lecture: "He who fears being conquered is sure of defeat"

contents.author: – James Freeman Clarke
contents.lecture: "A politician thinks of the next election. A statesman, of the next generation"

contents.author: – Euripides
contents.lecture: "Friends show their love in times of trouble, not in happiness"

contents.author: – Joseph Addison
contents.lecture: "Reading is to the mind what exercise is to the body"
